segments.text: Those kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool is about to tip over, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly for her share, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are both so focused on those cookies, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that they are being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what they are up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of potential accidents, it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when the woman finally notices them.
segments.speaker: PAR
